Key Match Events: Afghanistan lost to Pakistan by one wicket in the last over thriller.
Naseem Shah struck two match-winning sixes to shatter the hopes of Afghanistan.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghan captain Mohammad Nabi revealed that players in his team took tranquilisers following their loss against Pakistan.
Nabi shared that players were really disturbed after their defeat against Pakistan, with some even taking sleeping pills.
Nabi expressed satisfaction with his team's overall performance in the tournament, noting that they gave tough time to top teams and gained good momentum ahead of T20 World Cup.
